Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts our main character at the age of 18 (youth) when he completed his first volume of poetry “Cherry Blossoms,” at the age of 24 (relic) when his second book “Glimmering Illusion” was published
